name: infographic
description: Generate professional infographics using Gemini AI with a guided, conversational flow. Features visual reasoning (finds the shape of your idea, not just template matching), style discovery (extract from website or choose presets), section-by-section validation, multi-turn image editing, and learned preferences that improve over sessions. Gracefully handles missing API keys by outputting ready-to-use prompts.

changelog.2.0.0: Complete redesign: guided conversational flow, visual reasoning framework, style presets, website color extraction, pattern bank for learned preferences, multi-turn image editing, graceful no-API-key fallback
changelog.1.1.0: Added brand guidelines persistence and series creation
